snowundertrees.config.title: Snow Under Trees Config
snowundertrees.config.option.description: If disabled, no snow will be generated under trees.
If disabled, snow will not be generated under trees when it is snowing.
If enabled, Snow Under Trees will respect season mods - snow will only generate during winter.
If enabled, snow under trees will melt during spring, summer and autumn with variable melt-rates based on the season.

A list of biome IDs that will have snow generated under trees.

If a season mod is installed, Snow Under Trees will first check if the biome can support snow in the current season alongside the biomes within this list.
